name: part_005
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン生誕祭2021】いっぱいありがとう！！Birthday Live2021【ホロライブ⧸紫咲シオン】 [oLZxkEJAm8U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Usada Pekora and Murasaki Shion talk about their past interactions and take commemorative photos in 3D.

subtitles.original: みなさん、この魔女をどうにかしてもらっていいぺこ？
subtitles.english: Everyone, can someone do something about this witch, peko?

subtitles.original: あ、やり、間違えた間違えた間違えた
subtitles.english: Ah, wait, I messed up, messed up, messed up.

subtitles.original: なに、なに？
subtitles.english: What, what?

subtitles.original: 隠れ、なんかかくれんぼのやつやっちゃった。かくれんぼのやつ
subtitles.english: I did the... like, the hide-and-seek one. The hide-and-seek one.

subtitles.original: それは違、それはるーちゃんとぺこらとシオン先輩、3人の時のやつだぺこ
subtitles.english: That's wrong, that's the one for when Ruu-chan, Pekora, and Shion-senpai, the three of us are together.

subtitles.original: あー、間違えた
subtitles.english: Ah, I messed up.

subtitles.original: 2人だぺこ。2人。
subtitles.english: It's for two people. Two.

subtitles.original: あれぺこだよ、なんかブーンってやつぺこ。
subtitles.english: It's that one, the 'broom' one, peko.

subtitles.original: ブーンってやるやつ？
subtitles.english: The one where we go 'broom'?

subtitles.original: わかった？
subtitles.english: Got it?

subtitles.original: あ、わかったわかった
subtitles.english: Ah, got it, got it.

subtitles.original: ブーン
subtitles.english: Broom!

subtitles.original: わかった、マリオカート！
subtitles.english: I got it, Mario Kart!

subtitles.original: そう、そう。それだぺこ、それだぺこ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah. That's it, peko, that's it.

subtitles.original: そうだよね、そうだよね
subtitles.english: Right, right.

subtitles.original: ちょっと、止まるぺこだよ。
subtitles.english: Wait, stop, peko.

subtitles.original: ど忘れちゃうぺこ。
subtitles.english: I'm having a memory lapse, peko.

subtitles.original: 待って、マリオカートめっちゃうまくない？
subtitles.english: Wait, aren't you really good at Mario Kart?

subtitles.original: そう、そう。え、すごいうまい
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah. Eh, you're really good.

subtitles.original: え、てかむしろごめんぺこだけど、ぺこらもそれが最初か分かんない
subtitles.english: Wait, actually, sorry but I don't even know if that was the first one either.

subtitles.original: うそでしょ、お前ふざけんなよ！マジで！
subtitles.english: No way, are you kidding me? Seriously!

subtitles.original: お前ふざけんなよ、マジで！
subtitles.english: Are you kidding me, seriously!

subtitles.original: すまんぺこだけど、多分ねぺこらの記憶的には、
subtitles.english: Sorry, peko, but in my memory,

subtitles.original: マリオカートシオン先輩と対決しようよみたいな感じで言ったぺこだよ
subtitles.english: I think I asked Shion-senpai to have a Mario Kart battle.

subtitles.original: やった、やった、やったよね。
subtitles.english: We did, we did, right.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ強かった印象がある
subtitles.english: I have an impression that you were really strong.

subtitles.original: ボコボコにした記憶ある。ボコボコにしたっけ？分かんない
subtitles.english: I remember beating you up. Did I? I don't know.

subtitles.original: ボコボコにされた気がする
subtitles.english: I feel like I got beaten up.

subtitles.original: え、てかさ、こうやって3Dコラボさ、ある意味初めてぺこだから、記念撮影しなーい？
subtitles.english: Wait, since this 3D collab is our first in a way, do you want to take some photos?

subtitles.original: しようよ！ちょっと真ん中行こう
subtitles.english: Let's do it! Let's go to the middle.

subtitles.original: 真ん中行こう。なんでこんな端に寄ってる
subtitles.english: Let's go to the middle. Why are we so far to the side?

subtitles.original: え、なにするぺこ？シオン君
subtitles.english: Eh, what should we do, Shion-kun?

subtitles.original: やっぱさ、ハートしようよ、ハート
subtitles.english: As I thought, let's do a heart, a heart.

subtitles.original: アイドルたるものね。よし行くよ
subtitles.english: As expected of idols. Alright, here we go.

subtitles.original: せーの、はい！
subtitles.english: One, two, hop!

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと
subtitles.english: Eh, wait...

subtitles.original: ねぇ、2人でハートって言ったのに
subtitles.english: Hey, I said a heart for two people.

subtitles.original: ごめん、ごめん、ごめん。あ、分かったわかった。ごめん
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry, sorry. Ah, I got it, got it. Sorry.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、ちょっと。ぺこらの片思いみたいになってたじゃん
subtitles.english: Hey, wait. It looked like Pekora's unrequited love.

subtitles.original: よし、やる、やる。はい、はい。行くよ
subtitles.english: Alright, let's do it. Yes, yes. Here we go.

subtitles.original: せーの、はい！
subtitles.english: One, two, hop!

subtitles.original: これ撮ってもらおうよ、みんなに
subtitles.english: Let's have everyone take a picture of this.

subtitles.original: 撮って撮って。ツイートしてツイート
subtitles.english: Take it, take it. Tweet it, tweet it.

subtitles.original: いいじゃん、いいじゃん、どうよ
subtitles.english: Looking good, looking good, how is it?

subtitles.original: いいじゃん、いいじゃん、すごい可愛い
subtitles.english: Looking good, looking good, so cute.

subtitles.original: ハートでしょ。ハート、ハート。いいね
subtitles.english: It's a heart. Heart, heart. Nice.

subtitles.original: いいよね。さっきこうやってやってる人いたけど
subtitles.english: It's nice. There was someone doing this earlier though.

subtitles.original: いやいやいや、さっきこうやってやってる人いましたけど
subtitles.english: No no no, there was someone doing that earlier.

subtitles.original: じゃあ次、片思い
subtitles.english: Then next, unrequited love.

subtitles.original: え、片思い？いやいやいや
subtitles.english: Eh, unrequited love? No no no.

subtitles.original: 次、うさぎやろう、うさぎ。ぺこらのうさぎ
subtitles.english: Next, let's do rabbit, rabbit. Pekora's rabbit.

subtitles.original: うさぎ、うさぎ、いいの？耳つけて。いいよ
subtitles.english: Rabbit, rabbit, is that okay? With ears. Okay.

subtitles.original: これ揺れるぺこだよ。
subtitles.english: These sway, peko.

subtitles.original: あ、いいのめっちゃ揺れてんじゃん。なめらかに。
subtitles.english: Ah, nice, they're swaying a lot. Smoothly.

subtitles.original: うさぎ跳びして、はい
subtitles.english: Do a bunny hop, go.

subtitles.original: 行くよ。せーの
subtitles.english: Here we go. One, two...

subtitles.original: あ、ぴょん！可愛い、いいよ！
subtitles.english: Ah, boing! So cute, nice!

subtitles.original: これ最高ぺこ。最高ぺこ。
subtitles.english: This is the best, peko. The best, peko.

subtitles.original: やばい、ちょっと、ごめんなさいぺこ
subtitles.english: Oh no, wait, sorry, peko.

subtitles.original: 短いスカート、見ないであげてくださいちょっと。NGですよ
subtitles.english: Short skirt, please don't look. It's NG.

subtitles.original: NG。でも可愛いね、うさぎね。
subtitles.english: NG. But it's cute, the rabbit.

subtitles.original: アイドルの動き見せて、いいよ
subtitles.english: Show us some idol moves, nice.

subtitles.original: 他になんかあるぺこ？
subtitles.english: Is there anything else, peko?

subtitles.original: 他なんだろう。え、ちょっとさ、ぺこちゃん、ちょっと写ってよ、カメラに
subtitles.english: What else... Eh, wait, Peko-chan, get in the shot, on camera.

subtitles.original: なに、なに？イェーイしてイェーイ
subtitles.english: What, what? Do a 'yay', 'yay'.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 映ってる、映ってる
subtitles.english: You're in the shot, you're in the shot.

subtitles.original: はい、鬼。え、クソガキ。
subtitles.english: Look, an ogre. Eh, brat.

subtitles.original: クソガキぺこじゃんマジで。はい角生えちゃった
subtitles.english: You're a brat, Pekora, seriously. Look, you've got horns.

subtitles.original: クソガキぺこじゃんただのそれ。よくテレビとかにいるわ
subtitles.english: You're just a bratty Pekora. You see them on TV a lot.

subtitles.original: じゃあぺこらがシオン先輩の事、耳生やすことできないかな？
subtitles.english: Then, can Pekora make ears grow on Shion-senpai?

subtitles.original: どうにかして。あ、できそうじゃない。うさ耳、あ、いいじゃんいいじゃん！
subtitles.english: Try somehow. Ah, it looks like it might work. Rabbit ears, ah, nice, nice!

subtitles.original: うさぎになっちゃった。うさぎになっちゃった
subtitles.english: I turned into a rabbit. I turned into a rabbit.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、いてっ。痛っ。
subtitles.english: Hey, ouch. Ouch.

subtitles.original: 勝つ、勝つみたいになっちゃった。ちょっと
subtitles.english: It became like 'victory' (V sign). Wait.

subtitles.original: いやでも本当にね、お誕生日ライブこれからも頑張ってほしいぺこなので、
subtitles.english: But really, I want you to keep doing your best with your birthday live, so

subtitles.original: ぺこらはそろそろお暇しなきゃいけないぺこから
subtitles.english: Pekora has to take her leave soon.

subtitles.original: 寂しいけど、またでも歌ってくれるぺこか？
subtitles.english: It's sad, but will you sing again?

subtitles.original: いいよ！また遊ぼうね
subtitles.english: Sure! Let's play again.

subtitles.original: あ、遊ぼうぺこ。じゃあバイバイ！
subtitles.english: Ah, let's play, peko. Then, bye-bye!

subtitles.original: バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと待って。ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Ah, wait a second. Wait a second.

subtitles.original: この世で造花より綺麗な花はないわ
subtitles.english: In this world, there is no flower more beautiful than an artificial one.

subtitles.original: 何故ならば総ては嘘で出来てる
subtitles.english: Because everything is made of lies.

subtitles.original: アンチパシーは
subtitles.english: Antipathy is...

subtitles.original:
フォニイ
作詞・作曲 ツミキ
subtitles.english:
Phony
Lyrics & Composition: Tsumiki

subtitles.original: フォニイ、フォニイ、フォニイ
subtitles.english: Phony, phony, phony.

subtitles.original: 絶望の雨は私の傘を突いて
subtitles.english: The rain of despair pokes at my umbrella,

subtitles.original: 湿らす前髪と心の二面
subtitles.english: wetting my bangs and the two sides of my heart.

subtitles.original: 煩わしいわ。いつしか言の葉は疾うに枯れきって
subtitles.english: How annoying. Before I knew it, my words had long since withered away,

subtitles.original: 事の実、形に餓えている
subtitles.english: hungering for the truth, for a form.

subtitles.original: 鏡に映り嘘を描いて
subtitles.english: Reflected in the mirror, painting a lie,

subtitles.original: 自らを見失ったメイク
subtitles.english: losing sight of myself in this makeup.

subtitles.original: パッパッパラッパッパラパパパ
subtitles.english: Pa-pa-pa-ra, pa-pa-pa-ra-pa-pa-pa

subtitles.original: 爛々、数えて遊びましょう
subtitles.english: Languidly, let's count and play.

subtitles.original: パッパッパラッパッパラパパパ
subtitles.english: Pa-pa-pa-ra, pa-pa-pa-ra-pa-pa-pa

subtitles.original: 爛々、此処で踊ってるのよ
subtitles.english: Languidly, I'm dancing right here.

subtitles.original: 簡単なことも解らないわ
subtitles.english: I don't even understand simple things.

subtitles.original: あたしって何だっけ
subtitles.english: What was I again?

subtitles.original: それすら夜の手に綻びて
subtitles.english: Even that unravels in the hands of the night,

subtitles.original: 愛の様に
subtitles.english: just like love.

subtitles.original: 嫌、嫌
subtitles.english: No, no.

subtitles.original: さよならも言えぬまま泣いた
subtitles.english: I cried without even being able to say goodbye.

subtitles.original: フォニイ、フォニイ、フォニイ
subtitles.english: Phony, phony, phony.

subtitles.original: 嘘に
subtitles.english: In a lie...
